#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	char foo[][4] =
		{ {""}, {"pa"}, {"re"}, {"ci"}, {"vo"}, {"mk"}, {"x"}, {"zi"}, {"bi"},
	{"so"}
	};

	char num[1050]={'\0'};
	int i = 0, temp;

	scanf("%s", &num);

	while (num[i])
	{
		temp = num[i] - '0';

		printf("%s", foo[temp]);

		i++;
	}

	return 0;
}
